statements: SELECT * FROM Farmers
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location FROM Farmers ORDER BY farmer_name ASC
SELECT farmer_id, farmer_name FROM Farmers WHERE water_usage > 100
SELECT * FROM Farmers WHERE farm_location LIKE '%California%'
SELECT MAX(water_usage) AS max_water_usage FROM Farmers
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location FROM Farmers WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY farmer_name ASC
SELECT farmer_name, water_usage FROM Farmers WHERE farm_location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY water_usage DESC
SELECT * FROM Farmers WHERE farmer_name = 'John Doe' OR farm_location = 'Texas'
SELECT farmer_id, farmer_name FROM Farmers WHERE water_usage BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY farmer_id ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_farmers FROM Farmers
SELECT * FROM farmers;
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location FROM farmers WHERE water_usage > 100;
SELECT farm_location, farmer_name FROM farmers WHERE farmer_id = 3;
SELECT system_type, irrigation_area FROM irrigation_system WHERE system_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM farmers WHERE water_usage <= 50;
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location FROM farmers WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY farmer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_system WHERE farm_id IN (SELECT farmer_id FROM farmers WHERE farm_location = 'California') ORDER BY system_type DESC;
SELECT farmer_id, farmer_name, farm_location, water_usage FROM farmers WHERE water_usage < 50 AND farm_location LIKE '%Valley%' ORDER BY water_usage DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, irrigation_area FROM farmers JOIN irrigation_system ON farmers.farmer_id = irrigation_system.farm_id WHERE system_type = 'Drip' ORDER BY irrigation_area ASC;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_irrigation_systems, AVG(irrigation_area) AS avg_irrigation_area FROM irrigation_system JOIN farmers ON irrigation_system.farm_id = farmers.farmer_id WHERE farmers.water_usage > 200 GROUP BY farmers.farmer_id HAVING avg_irrigation_area > 50;
SELECT * FROM farmers ORDER BY farmer_name DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location FROM farmers WHERE farm_location='California';
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location FROM farmers WHERE farmer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location FROM farmers WHERE farm_location='New York' AND farmer_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT system_name, sensor_id FROM irrigation_systems;
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location FROM farmers WHERE farmer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_systems WHERE sensor_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY system_name DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location, sensor_type FROM farmers f JOIN irrigation_systems i ON f.farmer_id = i.system_id JOIN sensors s ON i.sensor_id = s.sensor_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_farmers FROM farmers;
SELECT farmer_name, sensor_location FROM farmers f JOIN irrigation_systems i ON f.farmer_id = i.system_id JOIN sensors s ON i.sensor_id = s.sensor_id WHERE f.farmer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM farmer;
SELECT name, location FROM farmer WHERE id = 1;
SELECT crop_type, acres FROM farm ORDER BY crop_type DESC;
SELECT system_type, water_source, capacity FROM irrigation_system WHERE farm_id = 2;
SELECT date, total_water_used FROM water_usage WHERE system_id = 3 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM farmer WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT farm.id, farm.crop_type, farmer.name FROM farm JOIN farmer ON farm.farmer_id = farmer.id WHERE farmer.location = 'Texas' ORDER BY farm.acres DESC;
SELECT water_source, capacity, system_type FROM irrigation_system WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY water_source ASC;

SELECT farm.id, farm.crop_type, SUM(water_usage.total_water_used) AS total_water_used FROM farm JOIN irrigation_system ON farm.id = irrigation_system.farm_id JOIN water_usage ON irrigation_system.id = water_usage.system_id GROUP BY farm.id, farm.crop_type ORDER BY total_water_used DESC;

SELECT farm.id, farm.crop_type, SUM(water_usage.total_water_used) AS total_water_used FROM farm JOIN irrigation_system ON farm.id = irrigation_system.farm_id JOIN water_usage ON irrigation_system.id = water_usage.system_id WHERE water_usage.date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' GROUP BY farm.id, farm.crop_type ORDER BY total_water_used DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterSources;
SELECT source_name, capacity FROM WaterSources WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT source_name FROM WaterSources WHERE source_name LIKE 'River%';
SELECT id, field_name, size FROM Fields ORDER BY size DESC;
SELECT manager_name, field_name, location FROM FarmManagers JOIN Fields ON FarmManagers.field_id = Fields.id;
SELECT * FROM WaterSources
SELECT source_name, capacity FROM WaterSources WHERE capacity > 100
SELECT Fields.field_name, Fields.size, Fields.location, FarmManagers.manager_name FROM Fields JOIN FarmManagers ON Fields.id = FarmManagers.field_id

SELECT IrrigationLogs.irrigation_date, Fields.field_name, IrrigationLogs.water_used FROM IrrigationLogs JOIN IrrigationSystems ON IrrigationLogs.system_id = IrrigationSystems.id JOIN Fields ON IrrigationSystems.field_id = Fields.id

SELECT WaterSources.source_name, Fields.field_name, Fields.size, IrrigationLogs.irrigation_date FROM WaterSources JOIN IrrigationSystems ON WaterSources.id = IrrigationSystems.water_source_id JOIN Fields ON IrrigationSystems.field_id = Fields.id WHERE Fields.size < 100
